titles.title: Ritchie Boys Congressional Gold Medal Act
Ritchie Boys Congressional Gold Medal Act

To award a Congressional Gold Medal to the Ritchie Boys, in recognition of their bravery and dedication and the importance of their contributions to the success of the Allied Forces during World War II.

bill.summary:
Ritchie Boys Congressional Gold Medal Act
This bill provides for the award of a Congressional Gold Medal to commemorate the Ritchie Boys (men who trained at Camp Ritchie, a War Department military intelligence training center) in recognition of their contributions to the success of the Allied Forces during World War II.
